Name: Match It!
About the game: A fun VR matching game that's great for the whole family! See how fast you can clear the blocks... match by numbers or colors. Select combos of mode, colors, and number of blocks. Each combination has its own leaderboard. When the game starts you'll be at the top, but it will take some fast matching to stay there! Credits: Sound effects obtained from ZapSplat! Featured Artists in November: SoundCloud: Hyster SoundCloud: Korizon
Meta Title: Match It!: Oct 20, 2020, Jesse McCabe and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Match It!? Check out the release date (Oct 20, 2020), developer insights from Jesse McCabe, and a complete game summary.
